item.title: 6 Must-read Python Enhancement Proposals (PEPs)
item.description: These are a few of my favorite PEPs, or Python Enhancements Proposals I've encountered recently. PEP 0, PEP 8 and PEP 20 are great reads for those aspiring to hone their Python skills. The documentation sometimes references specific PEPs directly also. They document Python's evolution over time and the rationale â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
